item.title: Create a webapp without JS using HTMX
item.description: The fastest and easiest way to build a web application is to output HTML directly from the server. But what if you want to add a little interactivity, like letting the user add items to a shopping cart or filter a list of products? If you update the entire page every time the users click something, they’ll hate you with a passion. So you might consider using React or Vue, but that involves defining an api and adding a whole other build system to your application.
